participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
My parents are very supportive of my decision to take a break from work to focus on my family.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
i drink coffee every day.

participant_2.background:
I love listening to the band Gorillaz while I'm working at my candy store.
i make 35 million a year.
i have 3 dogs and a parrot.
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well today, thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I am doing well today as well. Thank you for asking!
Great to hear! I am currently retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends. What do you do for fun?
I currently work at a candy store and enjoy listening to the band Gorillaz while I work.
That sounds like a fun job! I love Gorillaz too! What is your favorite song by them?
My favorite song by them is Clint Eastwood.
That is a great song! I also like Feel Good Inc. and Dirty Harry.
Those are both great songs too! I love how they have such a unique sound.
Me too! They are one of my favorite bands.
I am glad to hear that! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to make short films and share them with my friends and get their feedback.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have always wanted to make a short film, but I have never had the time.
It is a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thank you for the suggestion!
